data.title: Favorite Thai
data.text: Have had lunch here several times. Extensive menu, well priced! Especially like the Sates w cucumber salad and Phat Tai. Fast friendly service.

data.title: honest excited because of the rating but dissapointed
data.text:
I was really excited to try this place but was severely disappointed. 

I ordered two orders of pad thai chicken and two crab delight appetizers. One of the dishes was 0 stars spicy the other 2 stars. I wanted to judge their level of spicy.  On the 2 star spicy dish I ordered extra meat. I wanted to judge the level of meat given between a regular order and extra meat. I was of course charged more for this.

Here is what I experienced. The noodles were stuck together like a brick on the bottom and loose on the top. I utilize chopsticks avidly, when you can pick up the whole dish...there's a problem.

 I started with the spicy 2 star dish with extra meat. I was delighted to see a double portion of meat. although the noodles were like a brick I continued to search the flavor. Unfortunately not spicy at all. The dish was less spicy than expected almost blandly spiced.

I moved on to the dish with 0 stars their original prep. I was displeased as I only had 3 pieces of chicken in the dish the size of a 50 cent piece. This dish made me feel like either both dishes were prepared at once and no thought given to the order. Or the extra meat I paid for some how transitioned to the chicken owed me taken at a loss because hardly any meat was in my original dish. If they prepare the most basic Thai dish like this what does that say for the more complex dishes?

I understand people love this restaurant, that's your right. But from someone that has tasted quality thai food with careful prep this place falls short. I will never eat here again. My only other regrets are I tipped so heavily in my excitement and spent $50 for this experience.

Also while the crab delight had a great taste, I highly suspect krab.

data.title: tasty food but messed up my take out order
data.text:
but the food we did get was very yummy.   so yeah, they forgot my rice.  funny thing, they had called the hotel to see if I was up to paying the extra $2...  I said "of course".

they just made a forgivable mistake.......   but I was left at the hotel with no recourse since the delivery service had done its job...... the beef red curry was yummy

data.title: Thai food
data.text: I had a dinner this restaurant with my family. We have a good welcome from staffs and here were made very good taste of food. We will go again the next time.

data.title: Top notch Thai food!
data.text: We were in Renton on business and asked a local where to eat, and she suggested the Royal Orchid.  Great advice!  The food was excellent and the service great even though the restaurant was really busy.  Great lunch menu.  Very reasonable.

data.title: Authentic Thai food
data.text:
Good taste! Authentic Thai food, especially the papaya salad and mango sticky rice... I love it... 

非常正宗的泰国菜，特别是木瓜沙拉和芒果糯米饭…… 除了没有泰国那么辣，其他的味道很接近泰国的味道啦……推荐一下，很喜欢……

data.title: Consistently good food
data.text: The food here is consistently good. I work nearby and my coworkers also enjoy their food. It can be really busy at lunch so that can impact the amount of wait time to get food but I the staff work very hard. I have liked every item I have had off their menu. Enjoy!

data.title: Good Thai food in Renton
data.text: Royal Orchid is easy to find on Rainier Ave S.  Their food is consistently good.  I like the Tom Ka soup with Chicken.  Also the Chicken curry is good.  The service is very attentive.

data.title: Royal Orchid
data.text: My first time eating at a Thai restaurant. The food was good and the service very friendly. Good choice by my son! Will definitely return.

data.title: Great take out as well as dine in
data.text: I eat here at least once a month.  The food is good, the servers gracious, the prices fair.  I can order take out and it's generally ready for pickup in 15-20 minutes.

data.title: Ahhh. Nothing Special.
data.text:
Simple...smaller portions..clean. Friendly.
If you are hungry, or if you live close/ are in the area then you would get fed....
Better Thai in SouthCenter Mall Area Thaibplaces...or Seattle.

data.title: Best Thai food
data.text: we went to royal orchid recently for dinner . The food was excellent and they had a wide variety of Thai favorites to choose from .It has a very nice at mosphere and the prices are very reasonable highly recommended (service is great.). .. Delicious for food....make order very fast I like more menu

data.title: Our favorite local Thai restaurant
data.text: Great food, pleasant service and always consistent.  This is out go-to place for delicious food.  We ove this place!

data.title: Always good
data.text: We eat here and get take out a lot as well.   Everything is always really well prepared, great flavors.   Prices are very reasonable especially considering the quality of the food.  My only dislike is they use Styrofoam for most take out dishes.

data.title: Consistently great Thai food
data.text: We have gone to Royal Orchid over the years as a regular customer.  We try all the others and return here.  Why do we even try others?  Good question.  One thing about Royal Orchid is the consistency of the staff and chef.  The food is always good.  The service is always great and the atmosphere is nice.  The Tom Kai soup is wonderful and we love the Green Curry Chicken ( except that they put in egg plant.... yuk)  We find their food is a little hotter than other places and we like that.  When you order 4 stars,... it is four stars not really one.  Their chef's specials are different and usually something we enjoy.

data.title: Great Food with Smiles
data.text: Decided to give this place a try and so went with a couple of my friends. They had plenty parking outside the place. We were seated immediately and were offered water. The waiter brought us the main menu along with the lunch specials. We all decided to go with the lunch special. We also ordered some wings. The wings were good, the sauce which came with the wings was sweet and so I took some hot sauce from the table. The lunch special was great. Rice (brown/white) with your choice of meat (garlic chicken, cashew chicken and some beef items), and noodles. The food tasted awesome! The service was outstanding. Highly recommended!

data.title: Absolutely amazing -- and literally service with a smile
data.text: On this...my second national tour...I've only now started to eat Thai food. I just never really had gotten around to it. And I've become a HUGE fan of it. So I decided to stop into Royal Orchid Thai Cuisine while here in Renton and OMG!! Firstly, this is literally a place where you get service with a sincere smile. What wonderful people. From the outside this looks like a little tiny restaurant not quite fast food but it is really wonderful d-i-n-i-n-g. I ordered hot and sour soup with I order at any Asian restaurant where I can find it. This was more flavorful than any I've ever had; I asked him about the chili in it and he said they use Thai chili. It was packed with the all natural ingredients and I chose chicken and there were nice thin slices of real chicken in it. I then ordered the Sweet and Sour dish and again chose chicken. I was VERY pleasantly surprised by two things: a)he askd me to choose on a scale of one to four the hotness (I chose medium, I am in town to do my comic ventriloquism show in a school and can't chance a...."disruption"...should I say). I LOVE hot but I needed medium. b)when I asked for rice he asked "White rice or brown rice"?" not a question I get at most Asian restaurants (I chose brown). And what can I say about the main dish except again it was UTTERLY SUPERB: big, chunks of real vegetables (including pineapple) in the best sauce ever, with fresh chicken and great rice. I asked for a Thai iced tea. At some places you get what seems like a mix. This was 100 percent home made. And that's the "motif" of this restaurant, great food made with great care and great ingredients. This is not a super cheap restaurant but it's not super expensive. I LOVED THIS PLACE and since it's only the past three months that I've gotten into Thai food this makes me want to go to more Thai restaurants. But I suspect they are NOT as good as this one. A treasure for Renton ...and all who visit!!!

data.title: Great Lunch out or in
data.text: The food is great, service is always there with a smile, price is reasonable for both lunch and supper... and they have a cool fish tank population :o)  Love their wide ride noodle dishes and the vegetable delight!

data.title: Exquisite
data.text: I don't use that word very often.  I was pleasantly surprised by the crab delight purses.  The wonton wrapper had tiny bubbles and was so crispy.  Heaven!  If you are a crab rangoon connoisseur ..... you have found perfection.  The drunken noodles were BETTER than a place I used to go to that closed.  I feel like I've hit the mother-load!  The noodles were wide and held the spice of that 3/4 star order.  It wasn't overloaded with onion or pepper .... just the right balance.  The chicken was fresh and you could taste it.  I did everything but lick the plate.  The aspect that sealed the deal (of my new favorite place) and will have me coming back (and telling friends) was the WAY that the ENTIRE staff treated me.  I felt welcome, respect, caring, efficiency and honesty ... all in one service experience.  That is talent.  I have since returned with my small daughter and I'm pretty sure they seated us by the fish tank because the ARE just THAT talented.  I can't say more than:  I love this place (and am sooo happy to have found it)!

data.title: Very Good Thai food
data.text: We were a little apprehensive given the looks of the area and the outside appearance of the restaurant but fortunately we overcame this and were treated to a most enjoyable dining experience. The food is authentic, priced well and the servings are ample. The service was fast and friendly and the restaurant is obviously well known by the locals as there was a constant turnover of the tables. Should we stay in this area in the future we will definitely return.
